overview: Filmed during the autumn of 2021; follow the indie-rock band, The World is a Beautiful Place & I am No Longer Afraid to Die, as they tour the United States and Canada while the pandemic ranges across the globe. At a time when virtually no bands were touring, the band does everything in their power to keep themselves, and their fans safe. However, the world is still getting used to this new normal, and uncertainty follows the band closely.
title: Thank You For Being Here
